sql.update: CREATE TABLE `logininfo` ( `id` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `username` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `password` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `title` ( `id` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `introduce` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `path` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sort` bigint(8) DEFAULT NULL, `inserttime` bigint(8) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `text` ( `id` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `image` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `introduce` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `content` MEDIUMTEXT DEFAULT NULL, `textType` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, `iftop` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, `ifcarousel` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, `insertTime` bigint(8) DEFAULT NULL, `dianji` bigint(8) DEFAULT NULL, `dianzan` bigint(8) DEFAULT NULL, `author` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, `tag` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `friend` ( `id` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `url` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `remarks` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sort` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, `inserttime` bigint(8) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `liuyan` ( `id` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `content` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `zan` bigint(8) DEFAULT NULL, `cai` bigint(8) DEFAULT NULL, `lytype` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, `type` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, `ssly` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, `sstext` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, `time` bigint(8) DEFAULT NULL, `ip` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
